name: Hyperspace Warbattle: Daedalus Requiem
description:
Hyperspace Warbattle: Daedalus Requiem was made for Mini LD 62 "Final Boss".

Image the most epic space battle ever - with the mighty hero squaring off, ship-to-ship in a grand conflict!

Now image your not captaining one of the ships. You're not even watching. You are nothing, sitting at your desk, doing your boring job... enjoy!
